result.cont_job_skill:
Seeking entry-level engineering positions in the materials,manufacturing,and energy industries
starting on or after June 2021 (while working on a Master's part-time).
One year of internship work experience in the energy and manufacturing sector.
Adept at applying data science and software tools to solve engineering problems.
Experienced in chemistry research methods.
Software:Python,Java,Matlab,JavaScript,HTML/CSS,Fusion 360,Bash,Aspen,COMSOL
Laboratory:Gas Chromatography,Mass Spectrometry
Languages:English (Native),Mandarin (Native)
Work Research Experience
Solar Turbines
San Diego,CA
Software Engineering Assistant
Jun.2020 to Aug.2020
Leveraged Python computer vision and deep learning modules to extract information from piping
and instrumentation diagrams (P&IDs)as part of a team of three interns.
Provided a P&ID UI feature for the gas turbine human-machine interface using JavaScript,HTML,
and CSS.
National Renewable Energy Laboratory
Golden,CO
Engineering Materials Intern
Jan.2020 to May 2020
Implemented thermodynamic equilibrium calculations in MATLAB for predicting ternary phase
dlagrams of salt hydrate systems.
Investigated methods for synthesizing novel salt hydrate materials.
Solar Turbines
San Diego,CA
Engineering Assistant
May 2019 to Aug.2019
Saved 78 engineering hours and $8,500 per turbine project by developing a Python Java
program that automatically determines optimal gas detector placements in turbine packages
Implemented the automation program using CFD data,CAD and optimization algorithms.
Conducted training on how to use the program to CFD engineers within the department.
Mark Asta Computational Materials Science Research Group
Berkeley,CA
Undergraduate Research Assistant
July 2018 to May 2019
Developed Python and Bash programs to automatically calculate energies of perovskite materials
with DFT.
